content: 1 chain 3 double_crochet 12 into the ring join with a slip_stitch to first double_crochet not chain 3 12 double_crochet round 2 chain 2 1 double_crochet in same st fpdc around the chain 3 from previous round and the same st you just put a double_crochet into *1dc in next st fpdc around the same st* repeat *to* to end join with a slip_stitch to first double_crochet 12 fpdc 12 double_crochet round 3 chain 2 1 double_crochet in same st 1 double_crochet in next st that s the first fpdc from previous round fpdc around the same st you just put a double_crochet into *1 double_crochet in next 2 sts note the 2nd st is always the fpdc fpdc around fpdc* repeat *to* to end join with a slip_stitch to first double_crochet 12 fpdc 24 double_crochet round 4 slip_stitch to first fpdc from prevoius round chain 1 single_crochet in same st skip 2 sts those are the 2 double_crochet from prev round 7 double_crochet in next fpdc *skip 2 sts single_crochet in next fpdc skip 2 sts 7 double_crochet in next fpdc* repeat *to* to end join with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet 6 single_crochet 6 petals of 7 double_crochet fasten_off round 5 change colour join color 2 in any single_crochet from previous round chain 1 1 puff st in the same st 1 bphdc in next 2 sts 1 bpsc in next 3 sts 1 bphdc in next 2 sts *1 puff st in next st note that s a single_crochet from previous round 1 bphdc in next 2 sts 1 bpsc in next 3 sts 1 bphdc in next 2 sts* repeat *to* to end join with a slip_stitch to first puff st 6 puff st 24 bphdc 18 bpsc round 6 chain 1 *1 fpdc around the puff st 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts* repeat *to* to end join with a slip_stitch to first fpdc 6 fpdc 24 half_double_crochet 18 single_crochet k a m e crochet designs 2019 by krisztina anna matejcsok-edomer all rights reserved round 7 slip_stitch to the next st slip_stitch to next st slip_stitch to next st note that s the 3rd st to the left of the first fpdc from the previous round chain 3 counts as double_crochet 1 treble_crochet 1 double_crochet in same st corner 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts *1 double_crochet 1 treble_crochet 1 double_crochet in next st corner 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts* repeat *to* to end join with a slip_stitch to top of chain 3 4 treble_crochet 24 double_crochet 16 half_double_crochet 12 single_crochet round 8 slip_stitch to next st that s the treble_crochet from previous round
